### Description

<!-- Description of the issue -->
When trying to edit line 52, I select with the coursor and start typing, however the text in the line above is being edited. Tried on two computers, same issue. Version 1.59.0. Just installed on both computers after being away from the application for one year..

When trying to edit line 52, I select with the coursor and start typing, however the text in the line above is being edited. Tried on two computers, same issue. Version 1.59.0. Just installed on both computers after being away from the application for one year..
